message:
SYSTEM: NeOn-Methodology-v1.pdf: Página 3
3
Scenarios for Building Ontology Networks within the NeOn Methodology
Our Aim: The NeOn Methodology Framework
To create the NeOn Methodology for Building Ontology
Networks
to support
both
the
collaborative
aspects
of
ontology development and the reuse and dynamic evolution of
networked ontologies.
We have identified a set of nine scenarios for building 
ontologies and ontology networks
❑emphasizing the reuse of existing knowledge resources (ontological 
and non-ontological),
❑generalizing from previous experiences, 
❑covering the drawbacks of the existing methodologies, and 
❑taking into account the new trends based on collaboration, context 
and dynamism.
speaker: SYSTEM
